sub_title: Technical software consultant at ALTEN Nederland / Software engineer at ASML. 15y+ experience in applied math / stats / scientific computing / software engineering / EO.
summary:
Lenka is an experienced mathematician, scientific researcher, software engineer, mathematics teacher, IBM certified data scientist, freelance photographer and Earth observer from the Czech Republic, currently based in Tilburg, the Netherlands. 

She is a formally educated scientist specializing in mathematical modelling, applied mathematics / statistics, research / development / calibration / programming of models in natural sciences and engineering, with an experience in a wide range of applications including (a combination of) chemistry, engineering, ecology and geology, interested in data science and remote sensing / EO. Lenka is a lifelong learner, able to upskill rapidly.

Bringing balance and enhancement to exact sciences, her interest in photography grew up into passionate love for the craft. She has got her training in Professional Photography from the New York Institute of Photography. As a photographer, Lenka tries to capture positive emotions. Her work features images highlighting inner and outer beauty of various subjects. She loves finding unique and unexpected perspectives of subjects normally considered as ordinary. Inspired and creative perfectionist, she aims for images that may be thought-provoking, dramatic or tranquil, but always special and remarkable.

| STEM |
/mathematical modelling/parameter identification/differential equations/numerical mathematics/statistics/
/scientific programming/problem solving/algorithms/data science/Python/C/SQL/web scraping/
/Earth observation/satellite data/

| Teaching |
/mathematics, all levels: primary school/secondary school/university/adult education/
/lessons & projects for gifted children/

| Photography |
Inspired Photography
/product/still life/fine art/portrait/landscape/macro/
/design/scan/layout/photo manipulation/

profile_positions.description:
Software and training development to facilitate various research and training projects.

- Cross-platform desktop application development:
Based on a pre-existing proof-of-concept and basic core functionality, I have been responsible for the development of a highly versatile web scraper, incl. the app's GUI, code refactoring, functionality improvement, licensing system and license verification, new features, multiple input / output formats (JSON, YAML, KML, CSV, XLS, SQL etc.), substantially enhanced customizability (using custom 'recipes' - external files controlling settings and functionality of the app), multi-platform deployment incl. installers for macOS, Windows and Linux. For this application, I have also created 70+ custom scraping recipes.
Python, PySimpleGUI, web scraping using Beautiful Soup and Selenium, code compilation using Cython, packaging using py2app / PyInstaller / cx_Freeze, installers for macOS (.dmg) / Windows (.exe) / Linux (.deb)

- Product training:
I have created two WordPress/LearnDash-based online training courses (beginner / advanced) incl. media, quizzes, certificates of completion.

- NLP application:
I have created an application extracting specific data (e.g., URLs, emails, hashtags) from spreadsheet files.

- Web application development:
Inspired by the functionality of a pre-existing API-based search-oriented application, I have created from scratch a new application providing the same functionality without APIs (and thus, without the respective costs and limitations) and enhanced it with advanced search settings.
HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Google Advanced Search, Google Programmable Search Engines
